org.csc478.pokerGame.models

Class PlayingCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.csc478.pokerGame.models.PlayingCard

  • public class PlayingCard
extends java.lang.Object
    PlayingCard class to represent a standard playing card.
    Implements Requirement:
    REQ040300 - Must track card information, REQ040301 - Suit, REQ040302 - Rank
